query.description: The number of items per page
The page number

The relationships to include
The search query to filter accounts by name
The name of the account
The currency code of the account
Whether the account is the default account

request.description: Retrieve a list of accounts for the authenticated user in the current workspace.
Create a new account for the authenticated user in the current workspace.
Retrieve an account by its public ID for the authenticated user in the current workspace.
Update an account for the authenticated user in the current workspace.
Delete an account for the authenticated user in the current workspace.
Retrieve statistics for all accounts in the current workspace.
Attempt to authenticate a new session for the authenticated user.
Send a password reset link to the user's email.

query.description: The number of items per page
The page number
The field to sort by
The relationships to include
The name of the category
The classification of the category

request.description:
Retrieve a list of categories for the authenticated user in the current workspace.

Categories can be filtered by name and classification.
Results can be sorted by creation date.
Retrieve a category by its public ID for the authenticated user in the current workspace.
Retrieves a list of all supported currencies available in the system.

query.description: The search query to find institutions by name
The number of results to return

request.description:
Search for financial institutions based on a query parameter.
Returns up to 48 results sorted by popularity in descending order.
This endpoint is commonly used to help users find and select their
bank or financial institution when connecting accounts.
